__comment1: You can remove all fields that begin with __ to clean up what is delivered to the end user
__comment2: to, cc and bcc refer to those respective fields when sending the email.  The from and reply-to addresses will always be specified as the sender.
__comment3: All sections are given in order and must have a type, required, editable and value

sections.__comment1: introduction, title, paragraph, close and disclaimer are all valid types.  introduction and close use the receiver and sender information to replace text in || marks.  title is in bold and disclaimer is in smaller text
